Second Department,

September, 1971

(September 1, 1971) In the Matter of Morris A. Barone, Appellant, v. Mary Perone et al., Respondents. In the Matter of Morris A. Barone, Appellant, v. Harold P. Battle, Jr., et al., Respondents.

*772No opinion. Rabin, P. J., Munder, Shapiro, Gulotta 'and Benjamin, JJ., concur.
